name: Fast BlockControl
author: fastflow.io

sections.description:
Fast BlockControl is designed to work seamlessly with the Fast Flow tagging system. Fast Flow Dashboard

You can show or hide any block based on a users Fast Tag.

Multiple Fast Tags can be combined to create various show or hide conditions.

Once your WordPress are tagged they will either be shown the content you select or it will be hidden.

This way you can create a dynamic website which changes with your users interactions.

You can even sync the Fast Tags with various CRM’s so your site can be dynamically updated based in emails opened / clicked etc.

Fast Tags can be used to trigger automations on any other integrated platform which is supported by our growing number Fast Flow addons.

NOTE: Fast BlockControl requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to make use of the Fast Tags and utilise the user tagging.

https://wordpress.org/plugins/fast-flow-dashboard/

You can find out more about Fast Flow here

https://fastflow.io
sections.installation:
NOTE: This plugin requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to make use of Fast Tags.

Upload through your WordPress admin or via FTP.

Once uploaded simply activate and then navigate to the Fast Tags section of the Fast Flow Dashboard and begin adding tags.
